Section.name: About MBICEM
Section.description:
Madhu Bala Institute of Communication and Electronic Media (MBICEM) is a charitable organization committed to the evolution of Journalism and mass communication in mass media, event organization, advertising and public relations through education, training, research and consultancy. It edifies its students to be one media stop by training them to provide stronger, more coherent and more convincing messages to the masses.
Facts and Figures of Madhu Bala Institute of Communication and Electronic Media (MBICEM), New Delhi, Delhi
